column2: ONLY USE THIS FILE for vanilla replacements and non-dialogue; text that may be used in multiple different places
CUTE damage makes a good first impression on your opponent.\nSuccessful CUTE attacks deal double the damage on the first two turns of the battle!
CHARMING damage is perfect if you're looking to show off to your opponent.\nSuccessful CHARMING attacks increase your opponent's other damage multipliers!
CLEVER damage can be very powerful... if you've got the brains for it.\nSuccessful CLEVER attacks will restore some of your missing health!
COMEDIC damage is a risky way to quickly gain your opponent's affection.\nSuccessful COMEDIC attacks pack a punch, but missing will hurt!
\n[A bit of special attention to melt your opponent's heart.]
\n[An interest to ramble to your opponent about.]
\n[A truly terrible joke that might get a laugh out of your opponent.]
\n[Something cheesy to grab your opponent's attention.]
A fairly ordinary, but weak projectile.\n[Don't give up when you've got no tactics remaining!]
Draws 2 spells and adds lifetime to the cast\n[Commit to the tactics that are the most effective.]
Press [KICK] to dash in your current movement direction.\nWarning: You are not invincible during the cape's dash!\nDuration: 14 frames. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
Press [KICK] to destroy nearby enemy projectiles with precise timing.\nOn a successful parry, recharges instantly and grants brief invincibility.\nDuration: 8 frames. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Press [KICK] to slow down all projectiles for a time.\n\nDuration: 5 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Press [KICK] to power up your projectiles for a time.\nAll of your projectiles will create a damaging explosion a moment after they expire.\nDuration: 8 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
